testcase.classname: Demonstration of loading when action gets triggered that returns a result dynamically. It does not rely on the page to reload or finish loading. The page automatically gets updated through the use of JavaScript.
testcase.name: Example 1: Element on page that is hidden
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on Dynamically Loading.....................................passed And user clicks on example 1................................................passed Then start button is displayed and user clicks on the button................passed And waiting for loading counter.............................................passed And Hello World is displayed................................................passed

testcase.classname: Demonstration of loading when action gets triggered that returns a result dynamically. It does not rely on the page to reload or finish loading. The page automatically gets updated through the use of JavaScript.
testcase.name: Example 2: Element rendered after the fact
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on Dynamically Loading.....................................passed And user clicks on example 2................................................passed Then start button is displayed and user clicks on the button................passed And waiting for loading counter.............................................passed And Hello World is displayed................................................passed
